feed.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3

entry.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3
entry.summary: Matt Corallo, a Bitcoin developer, posted on the Bitcoin GitHub page that Wallet Encryption is now in a pull-able state. He mentioned that after much discussion and a bit of progress, he is looking for final comments or ACKs. Corallo also provided a link to the repository where users can view the code. The code has been rebased onto the wallet class and is ready for testing.
